entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
